website_summaries.verdict: A digital camera from the beloved brand that shoots photos and videos and has a bright, compact design.
pros: Captures high definition photos and videos
Numerous effects, stabilization, and face recognition features
cons: Requires a microSD memory card which is not included
Can take several seconds to focus, resulting in missed or blurry captures

customer_reviews.title: Rechargeable battery & poor quality pictures
customer_reviews.text: Description of camera says it takes 2 AA batteries but it came with a rechargeable battery. It takes the camera 2 to 3 seconds to focus and by the time the camera captures the picture you miss the moment. In addition the picture quality is very poor. I would not recommend buying this camera unless you want a rechargeable battery, slow focus, and poor quality pictures.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonianShopper

customer_reviews.title: Battery Doesn't Work!
customer_reviews.text: I think that the spring to keep the battery in was installed upside down or in the wrong location because I can't get the battery to charge or work. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Hersh

customer_reviews.title: Great pictures
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time in great condition. The camera was for my grandchild. She loves it. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it took ok picture but after 700 picture the power ...
customer_reviews.text: it took ok picture but after 700 picture the power on and off switch quit working so now i cant turn on the camera to use it very cheap made camera
customer_reviews.author: roger miears

customer_reviews.title: Has issues where it will not turn on and have ...
customer_reviews.text: Has issues where it will not turn on and have to remove battery and re install to turn the camera on.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Wloczewski

customer_reviews.title: Awful pictures
customer_reviews.text: The camera takes blurry pictures and no matter what setting it’s on you can’t see the picture clearly. It was bought has a gift and has to purchase a completely different camera
customer_reviews.author: Joyous R

customer_reviews.title: Your call.
customer_reviews.text: An OK camera. Great for the money. Pretty basic, but huge pics.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Avoid!!!
customer_reviews.text: The Polaroid IEX29-RED HD 18 MP is terrible, and I love this brand!
customer_reviews.author: SLS

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Worst camera I have ever purchased. I bought this for my daughter and the image quality is horrific.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Good beginning camera got it for my 4 year old grandson
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Dunlap

customer_reviews.title: This is Junk
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst camera I have ever owned. Don't buy it. Pictures are so bad you can not use them.I have always bought Canon cameras in the past but have had problems with the power lenses breaking so I thought I would give this a try what a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Art by Delilah

customer_reviews.title: They probably get better from here
customer_reviews.text: I agree with most of the negative comments about picture quality and focus control. After fooling around with the unit I found a few things out. I am not sure if they are functions or not but, in both modes I tried tapping the button to focus what I am looking at. If in picture mode then the hold the button to snap the picture. If in movie mode tap to focus works or hold the button and it will try to focus and record at once. Try to freak tweak it, it will try to do some of your bidding,,,,
customer_reviews.author: Cyberben

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Excuse For A Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is horrible. The controls are extremely confusing and nonsensical, but worse, the image quality is atrocious - truly astonishingly bad.
customer_reviews.author: Attila the Hunny

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had read the reviews before I bought ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had read the reviews before I bought this camera. I purchased at a brick and mortar store but returned it hours after. Cou,d not even get the battery to install. The company should not be selling this product it does not work
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: If I could put 10 minuses on here I would ...
customer_reviews.text: If I could put 10 minuses on here I would. Its been one thing after another. After taking three pictures the screen displayed "memory full". I'm sorry if I'm bitter but this is a joke
customer_reviews.author: shannon williamx

product_meta.title: Polaroid IEX29-RED HD 18 MP Optical Zoom Digital Camera with 2.4 Inch Preview Screen, Red
product_meta.description: Your perfect camera to capture all of life's adventures. The Polaorid iEX29 is light, compact and extremely portable. The 10x optical zoom allows you to get up close and personal to your subject, even when you're far away, and the digital image stabilization helps you line up your shot just right. A built-in flash ensures you can take clear pictures in any light and with HD video recording you can save memories in motion as well. The iEX29 conveniently uses two AA batteries and a standard size SD card (not included)
feature_bullets: Slim and compact point and shoot, fits easily into pockets, bags and purses
Capture every detail with high quality 18 megapixel photo resolution and HD video recording
A simple to use camera for kids, seniors and beginner photographers
Built in flash and digital image stabilizer make it easier to take photos in any light

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars30 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
